code: import React from'react';import{Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage}from'formik';import*as yup from'yup';import'./css/input.css';import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function insert(){var initialValue={title:'',description:'',username:''};var onSubmit=function onSubmit(data){axios.post(" http://localhost:3001/posts ",data).then(function(response){console.log(response.data);});};var validationSchema=yup.object().shape({title:yup.string().max(25).required('field required'),description:yup.string().min(5).max(90).required('field required'),username:yup.string().min(5).max(25).required('field required')});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"createPostPage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Formik,{initialValues:initialValue,onSubmit:onSubmit,validationSchema:validationSchema,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{className:"formContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Title :"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{id:"erroe",name:"title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{id:"create",name:"title",placeholder:"(Ex.Title)",autocomplete:"off"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Desciption:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{id:"erroe",name:"description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{id:"create",name:"description",placeholder:"(Ex.Desciption)",autocomplete:"off"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"username :"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{id:"erroe",name:"username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{id:"create",name:"username",placeholder:"(Ex.username)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})})});}export default insert;
